body: City of Fort Smith Postcards        Bird's Eye View of Fort Smith, Ark.showing Arkansas River        To view a larger image of this postcard in a new window, click here.       Birds Eye View of Residence Section, Fort Smith, Ark.        To view a larger image of this postcard in a new window, click here. To view additional postcards of Fort Smith, click on the small images on the right. To return to the main Postcards of Fort Smith page, click here.
title: Fort Smith National Historic Site: City of Fort Smith
